name: Goor Training
description:
Rouge-like top-down shooter with funny characters.(I am not an artist) My first game and also my first game jam. Survive until the end, if you can!. How does this fit the theme ? Well the less the less health you have the faster you go. Some enemies are too fast to outrun without getting hit!

Used pre music but made everything else made from scratch.

TO DOWNLOAD : JUST DOWNLOAD AND THEN OPEN THE ZIP FILE PLEASE.

shoot a lot at the start for the waves to come!!!
